thread.section_title: Hotel Jardins d'Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly,clean,good locations
thread.title_full: Friendly,clean,good locations - Review of Hotel Jardins d'Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Foxy2006
title: Friendly,clean,good locations
text:
Stayed here for 3 nights in the standard room (standard per Europe). Staff were friendly and very helpful. Bed was comfortable and room was clean. Hotel is on a quiet street with easy 10 min walk to Eiffel tower, lovely restaurants and the amazing Rue de Cler market near by.
Will stay here again on our next trip to Paris.
